subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Behind the exceptional hitting of shortstop Troy Tulowitzki — who went 10 for 16 in the series and hit a home run in all four games — the Rockies swept the Mets, who led in each of the games.
snippet: Behind the exceptional hitting of shortstop Troy Tulowitzki — who went 10 for 16 in the series and hit a home run in all four games — the Rockies swept the Mets, who led in each of the games.
